cast.overview: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy -- full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.
cast.title: The Prestige

details.biography: Sam Menning was born on January 5, 1925 in the USA as Samuel Albert William Menning. He is known for his work on The Prestige (2006), The Onion Movie (2008) and Whatever It Takes (2000). Menning also appeared in a few adult films in non-sex roles. He died on March 29, 2010 in Burbank, California, USA.
details.name: Sam Menning
